import React from "react"; const NaturalRemedies = () => { return (
{/* Top Image */}

Natural Home Remedies

{/* Natural Remedies for Period Cramps */}

Natural Remedies for Period Cramps

{/* Remedies Section */}
{/* Image */} {/* Remedies Content */}

Period Cramps Relief

  • Fenugreek Seeds (Methi): Soak overnight and drink the water to reduce cramps.
  • Heat Therapy: Apply a hot water bottle, sip warm liquids, and eat warm foods to relax uterine muscles.
  • Turmeric & Nutmeg: Mix with warm milk to reduce inflammation and improve sleep.
  • Ginger & Black Pepper Tea: Lowers prostaglandins, helps regulate periods, and fights fatigue.
  • Sesame Oil Massage: Apply on the lower abdomen to relieve pain using its anti-inflammatory properties.
  • Cumin Seeds (Zeera): Brew into tea for instant relief due to its anti-spasmodic effects.
  • Lemon & Ginger: Reduces cramps & inflammation.
  • Hot Bath: Eases pain & improves blood circulation.
  • Herbal Tea: Chamomile & fennel tea for relief.
{/* YouTube Video Section */}

Watch These for Quick Relief

{/* Best & Worst Foods Section */}

Best & Worst Foods for Periods

{/* Best Foods */}

✅ Best Foods & Drinks

  • Water & Hydrating Fruits – Prevent bloating & headaches.
  • Leafy Greens – Boost iron levels & reduce fatigue.
{/* Foods to Avoid */}

❌ Foods to Avoid

  • Salty & Sugary Foods – Cause bloating & mood swings.
  • Caffeine – Triggers headaches & dehydration.
{/* Recommended YouTube Channels */}
